weekly_top_story.headline: CMS Unveils MAHA ELEVATE Model to Fund Chronic Disease Prevention Pilots in Original Medicare
weekly_top_story.summary: CMS launched a voluntary initiative funding up to 30 pilot projects integrating lifestyle and evidence-based functional medicine into Medicare, advancing the Make America Healthy Again priority on chronic illness prevention and potentially transforming care delivery for millions of beneficiaries.

stories.headline: Dec. 19, 2025: National Advocacy Update
stories.summary: The AMA urged House leaders to include expansions for physician-owned hospitals in recent healthcare legislation, signaling potential growth in provider-led facilities that could enhance competition and access amid ongoing policy debates.

stories.headline: CMS releases 2025 Measures Under Consideration List
stories.summary: CMS published its 2025 list of 24 measures for potential adoption in Medicare programs, emphasizing digital data, chronic illness, and nutrition in line with MAHA priorities, which will shape future quality reporting and provider requirements.
